caption:
Inspired by their late family matriarch who launched a clothing brand in the 1970s, mother and daughter duo, Nina and Cheyenne, are continuing their family legacy decades later with the launch of their bold and vibrant apparel brand, @NinaCheyenne_Apparel. ⁠
⁠
"Nina Cheyenne is all about celebrating women of color with bold, vibrant fashion that makes a statement. As a mother-daughter, Black-owned brand, we design exclusive prints in-house, creating pieces that are as unique and powerful as the women who wear them. Our mission is simple- representation, confidence, and style that stands out. Because we deserve fashion that’s made for us, by us." - Nina 💫 ⁠
⁠
Follow @NinaCheyenne_Apparel and Shop www.ninacheyenne.com⁠
⁠
Own a boutique? They also offer wholesale opportunities so you can bring our one-of-a-kind pieces to your customers. Discover more at their wholesale account: faire.com/direct/ninacheyenne⁠
